overview: Midnight Oil, recorded live at RMIT University, in Melbourne Australia, on March 7, 1987.  Blossom And Blood, Bullroarer, Who Can Stand In The Way, Dreamworld, Best Of Both Worlds, The Dead Heart, Short Memory, Kosciusko, Hercules, Pictures, Read About It, What’s So Funny About Peace, Love And Understanding?, Power And The Passion, Only The Strong.
title: Midnight Oil – Live RMIT
